position: Data Scientist | IIM Mumbai | Krutrim | OLA | IIT Kharagpur '22

experience.title: Data Scientist I
experience.description: Building "Krutrim" - India's own AI focused on developing foundational model with an indic-rich context. Worked extensively in building pipelines for data preprocessing of petabytes of data from open-source and proprietary datasets.
experience.description_html: Building "Krutrim" - India's own AI focused on developing foundational model with an indic-rich context. Worked extensively in building pipelines for data preprocessing of petabytes of data from open-source and proprietary datasets. <!---->

experience.title: Data Scientist I
experience.description: Worked on use cases spanning from Operation Research, Time Series Forecasting, Classical Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision. Few key projects involve:1) EV Last Mile Delivery Optimization (Generated a forecasted GMV of INR 6 Cr. per annum and streamlined the LMD process across all stakeholders)2) Net Rides Completion Improvement (Increased GMV/day by 3% for a week for multiple cities)3) EV Sales Forecasting (Balanced the Safety stock ensuring 95% SLA)4) EV-specific Issue Category Modelling & Integration with Zendesk (Reduced daily TAT for issue category tagging by 3 hours)Also developed multiple POCs in the domain of CV and ML for optimizing the EV assembly line and improving quality inspection process.
experience.description_html: Worked on use cases spanning from Operation Research, Time Series Forecasting, Classical Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision. Few key projects involve:1) EV Last Mile Delivery Optimization (Generated a forecasted GMV of INR 6 Cr. per annum and streamlined the LMD process across all stakeholders)2) Net Rides Completion Improvement (Increased GMV/day by 3% for a week for multiple cities)3) EV Sales Forecasting (Balanced the Safety stock ensuring 95% SLA)4) EV-specific Issue Category Modelling & Integration with Zendesk (Reduced daily TAT for issue category tagging by 3 hours)Also developed multiple POCs in the domain of CV and ML for optimizing the EV assembly line and improving quality inspection process.

experience.title: Head
experience.description: ProDex is a product designing club in IIT Kharagpur focused on developing innovative products to real life problems. We are a 3 tier team of 20+ product designing enthusiasts with a compelling history of success in regional and national level hackathons.Currently, developing a prototype of women safety device (TaSafe) against assailant attacks.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Build an Augmented Analytics Model for go-to business insights to the client from the OneDataPlus platform of BDIPlus Labs. Worked on generating SQL using various sota NL2SQL models to hit the database when a client enters a natural language query (NLQ) in the search engine.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: 1) Build a Full-Text Search Engine to retrieve relevant candidate resume and job descriptions to users in MyWays platform2) Deployed state-of-the-art tool : Monstache connector to real-time sync approx. 11+ million documents from MongoDB to ElasticSearch3) Executed indexing, querying and filtering in ElasticSearch documents using elasticsearch-py in Python on candidates' resume and company JDs

publications: [{"title":"Knowledge-enhanced Transformer for Multivariate Long Sequence Time-series Forecasting","subtitle":"arXiv","date":"November 17, 2024","description":"In this paper, we introduce a novel approach for multivariate long sequence timeseries forecasting problem to encapsulate conceptual relationships among variables within a well-defined knowledge graph embedding. This forms dynamic and learnable KGEs for seamless integration into the transformer architecture. We investigate the influence of this integration into seminal architectures such as PatchTST, Autoformer, Informer, and Vanilla Transformer."},{"title":"Pretraining Data and Tokenizer for Indic LLM","subtitle":"arXiv","date":"July 17, 2024","description":"We present a novel approach to data preparation for developing multilingual Indic large language model. Our meticulous data acquisition spans open-source and proprietary sources, including Common Crawl, Indic books, news articles, and Wikipedia, ensuring a diverse and rich linguistic representation. For each Indic language, we design a custom preprocessing pipeline to effectively eliminate redundant and low-quality text content. Additionally, we perform deduplication on Common Crawl data to address the redundancy present in 70% of the crawled web pages. This study focuses on developing high-quality data, optimizing tokenization for our multilingual dataset for Indic large language models with 3B and 7B parameters, engineered for superior performance in Indic languages. We introduce a novel multilingual tokenizer training strategy, demonstrating our custom-trained Indic tokenizer outperforms the state-of-the-art OpenAI Tiktoken tokenizer, achieving a superior token-to-word ratio for Indic languages."},{"title":"Deep Reinforcement Learning for Optimizing Agri-Food Supply Chain","subtitle":"SSRN","date":"June 17, 2024","description":"This paper investigates applying DRL techniques such as Q-learning, Deep Q Learning (DQL), and the Actor-Critic to manage agri-food supply chain effectively. Our analysis demonstrates these models can significantly enhance decision-making processes across various supply chain stages, thus improving efficiency and increasing profit margins. We incorporate a supply chain through comprehensive simulations and empirical evaluations, considering real-world practical scenarios."},{"title":"CPAN chart: A Novel Customer Perception Analysis System Using Natural Language Processing and Attribute Control Charting","subtitle":"IEEE Transactions on Engineering Management","date":"March 14, 2024","description":"In this article, the CPAN (Customer Perception ANalysis) chart is developed, which will help the business owners to monitor the proportion of negative reviews on a temporal scale, augmented with the information on the most pervasive consumer grievances."},{"title":"Education in AI Era: A Novel Approach to Enhance Learning and Development","subtitle":"International Journal of Science, Engineering and Technology","date":"July 1, 2022","description":"In this paper, we have addressed some of the major challenges faced by students, teachers, and university management. Furthermore, we propose solutions that facilitate Artificial Intelligence to develop intelligent teaching and learning systems."}]
